basic_info.description: I am a full-stack developer who specializes in JavaScript technologies (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js) to build complete web applications with API systems and responsive user interfaces. I have a background in editorial and client services, which means I have a solid foundation of team communication, an obsession for detail, research, and a knack for inspiring cross-functional teams.

projects.title: Black Owned Business Tracker
projects.description: A web application that utilizes the ArcGIS API for JavaScript which tracks Black owned businesses in the Los Angeles area. Data courtesy of Black Girls M.A.P.P. Allows for client-side filtering data based on type of industry and utilizes ArcGIS route service.

projects.title: DevBlogs
projects.description: A blog application where the articles are markdown files and utilizes Next.js's MDX extension to parse Markdown and JSX metadata into readable content. It utilizes Tailwind for styling and cross-browser compatability, TypeScript for type-checking, and Next.js for server-side rendering and optimized performance.

projects.title: Inventory Management Application
projects.description: A menu driven application to manage the inventory in an online store. It allows you to create a profile and become an admin of a store where you can add stock, sales, purchases, and view stock, purchase, and sales reports using 4 seperate files as a codebase.

projects.title: Quest Runner
projects.description: A collaboration with 4 Software Developers and 3 UI/UX designers to create a gamified task assignment and reward system using MERN, 4 relational database models, and user authentication in a 4-day hackathon that won crowd favorite. User-friendly interface the ability for parents to register children, assign tasks and rewards with coin values, and for children to login, mark tasks complete, and redeem rewards through an increment and decrement function.
projects.tech: React.js • JavaScript • HTML5 • CSS3 • MongoDB • Express.js • Node.js •  Bootstrap

projects.title: Spotify
projects.description: This full-stack, Spotify-clone was created using Django and Python with a SQL database. It uses user authentication. Users have full CRUD capabilities on two models, which have 1:1, 1:M, and M:M relationships throughout the site.
projects.tech: Python • Django • PostgreSQL • HTML5 • CSS3 • JQuery

projects.title: Aviato
projects.description: Aviato is a full-stack e-commerce site inpired by today's growing small businesses. Created independently in a single week, it was built using MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js (MERN) with the addition of bcrypt for user authentication. It uses three models and has full CRUD functionality throughout the site.
projects.tech: React.js • JavaScript • HTML5 • CSS3 • MongoDB • Express.js • Node.js • Heroku • Netlify • Bootstrap • Bcrypt

projects.title: Twitter 2.0
projects.description: Completed in a single week with a Software Engineer a full-stack web application using MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js (MERN) and a user-empathetic interface with full-CRUD (create, read, update, and delete) capabilities through RESTful routing. Backend contains two database models (a tweets and comments schema) which serves user JSON data to the front-end.
projects.tech: React.js • JavaScript • HTML5 • CSS3 • MongoDB • Express.js • Node.js • Heroku • Netlify • Bootstrap

projects.description: A browser-based game utilizing JavaScript, CSS, and HTML. Responsive on mobile devices.

smaller_projects.title: Portfolio Template
smaller_projects.description: This project was merely an exercise in UX/UI design and text animation, built in a few hours. Not mobile responsive nor uses React.js, although it has the potential.

smaller_projects.title: HyperRealism
smaller_projects.description: A functioning TI-108 elementary school calculator. The purpose of this exercise was to get as close as possible to real-life.

smaller_projects.title: Interval Timer
smaller_projects.description: A user-customizable interval timer. Responsive on mobile devices.

smaller_projects.title: The Weather Window
smaller_projects.description: A client-rendered application that leverages third-party API and the read-only Navigator.geolocation property to deliver immediate weather forecast results for client's current and future weather. Collaborated with a Software Engineer in a one week sprint, engaged in daily-standups, worked on separate tickets, co-coding on blockers, and practicing version-control to create the wireframe, user stories and development of the application using React.js, JavaScript, JSX, and Node.js.
A browser-based game utilizing JavaScript, CSS, and HTML. Responsive on mobile devices.

smaller_projects.title: Candy Crush Memory Match
smaller_projects.description: A browser-based game to engage users in a Candy Crush Saga inspired memory matching game.

figma.title: Aviato Wireframe
figma.description: Independently teamed up with an exceptional product designer to conceive an innovative wireframe, transforming the cart, checkout, payment, and successful purchase pages into a harmonious blend of aesthetics and functionality.

figma.title: Quest Runner Wireframe
figma.description: Co-led a dynamic team of three talented UI/UX designers in a high-impact, 4-day hackathon, capturing the crowd's hearts with a winning wireframe showcasing captivating medieval gamification experiences across both mobile and desktop platforms.

experience.title: Software Engineer
description: Collaborated with a team of 15+ Software Engineers, Product and UX/UI Designers, UX Researchers, Data Scientists and Data Analysts on The Opportunity Project, led by the US Census Bureau, the US Department of Commerce and the FDA. Used federal data to build an application that will empower consumers (patients) through knowledge of privacy and security regarding their health data.

experience.title: Software Engineer Fellow
description: Full-stack software engineering immersive student in an intensive, 12-week, 450+ hour program focused on product development fundamentals, object-oriented programming, MVC frameworks, data modeling, and team collaboration strategies. Developed a portfolio of individual and group projects. Designed and built 3 full-stack applications and 1 client application that interacts with a third-party API. Participated in 2 hackathons.

experience.title: Server
description: Managed approximately 8 tables at a time, facilitating communication between 40 clients and kitchen staff. Oversaw the introduction of 30+ new food and drink items per quarter.

experience.title: Sales Associate
description: Developed a new system of operation leading to an approximate 140% increase in order completion and client satisfaction. Exceeded yearly expectations in sales KPI, upselling approximately $100,000 worth of product yearly. Established and became lead administrator of Sales Associate communication platform, managing up to 30 associates' contact information to ensure 100% coverage daily.

experience.title: Undergraduate
description: Bachelors in English. Contentration in professional writing.

experience.title: Editorial Intern
description: Supported and collaborated with Editor-in-Chief to write, meet deadlines, and publish B2B content twice per week for NutraIngredients-USA, CosmeticsDesign-USA, and Outsourcing Pharma. Established strong business relationships, maintained professional correspondence and liaised with 20+ industry managers, directors, suppliers, and press writers through verbal and written communication to support press releases, research, and commentaries.

experience.title: Editorial Intern
description: Founded 2 new columns for magazines New Face Magazine and Dreamlette. Conceptualized and produced 30+ articles for global fashion and entertainment magazine, New Face Magazine, which produced 17 issues that year and has 64k+ followers on social media.
